title: Domain Accessibility Audit
creator: Michigan State University
description: This web application automatically crawls websites and checks for accessibility violations. It can crawl within subdomains of the initial domain it starts with. It reports statistics of violations for the whole audit, domains and pages.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
